common.creator-settings-delete-tooltip: When you delete a survey, it stops automatically. You can retrieve and compare the results later. Participants cannot access the survey after deletion. This includes Views and Results.
common.creator-settings-pause-tooltip: You can pause the survey and resume it later. Participants do not receive a notification after entering a room. You can change the settings even after the survey is paused. Participants still have access to the survey.
common.creator-settings-continue-tooltip: Participants do receive a notification after entering a room and are allowed to vote again.
common.tooltip-option-select-result-visibility: Show vote for all in real time
common.tooltip-option-select-views-visibility: Show participation for all in real time
